column4: ...For some reason Ubantu has stopped recognizing my CRT and now it just says Unknown and it's stuck at 1024x768 at 60Hz (this is a CRT so imagine how annoying that must be on your eyes)... and i'm using an 82845GL and scrolling and moving windows is pretty laggy and its annoying
I'M guessing unity try to play with it to get it to work
i'm using Gnome because I hate Unity and it says i dont have the hardware for it
